metadata.title: CVE-2021-44730 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - high.
metadata.description:
snapd 2.54.2 did not properly validate the location of the snap-confine binary. A local attacker who can hardlink this binary to another location to cause snap-confine to execute other arbitrary binaries and hence gain privilege escalation. Fixed in snapd versions 2.54.3+18.04, 2.54.3+20.04 and 2.54.3+21.10.1

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-44730` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

snap-confine - 2.54.3+21.10.1
snapd - 2.54.3+21.10.1
snapd-xdg-open - 2.54.3+21.10.1
ubuntu-core-launcher - 2.54.3+21.10.1
ubuntu-core-snapd-units - 2.54.3+21.10.1
ubuntu-snappy - 2.54.3+21.10.1
ubuntu-snappy-cli - 2.54.3+21.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: snapd package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.54.3+21.10.1').
